summary:
Replaces the dragonplate armor texture with a molten style one.
Texture comes in 3 versions.

This is my first attempt at modding.
I did this for myself but it turned out to be pretty good s
descriptionHtml:
NOTE: Check my newest improvement on this file:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2625

EDIT: V1.01 Male version and shield texture added. See screenshots.

\"This one has just got out of the forge. Carefull not to burn yourself\"

This texture replaces the dragonplate armor with a sort of hot glowing metal look as if it just got out of the forge. All the metal pieces have been edited, also the bones had some recolor done.

I\'ve added 3 versions of the texture:
Original bone color.
Darker bone color.
Blueish bone color. (for a metalic look)

I\'m sure everybody is familiar with installation methods but feel free to leave a comment if you have any doubt.

HOW TO GET IT?
If you are a smithing freak like me you can produce the armor once you reach 100 at smithing skill.
For a quicker way type in the console without the quotes (\"):

\"player.additem 00013965\"  - Dragonplate Boots
\"player.additem 00013966\"  - Dragonplate Armor
\"player.additem 00013967\"  - Dragonplate Gauntlets
\"player.additem 00013969\"  - Dragonplate Helmet

Feel free to use this mod anyway you want. Just give proper credit.

Have fun.
author: Kameltosis
